items.sentence: Tom was diagnosed with autism when he was three years old.
Tom was fed up with having to repeat himself all the time.
Tom was gunned down on the sidewalk in front of his house.
Tom was just as surprised to see us as we were to see him.
I think that we should let Tom go to Australia by himself.
According to the chief of police, there were no survivors.
Are you certain it was Tom who showed Mary how to do that?
Are you certain it was Tom who taught Mary how to do that?
Are you going to see any of your friends over the weekend?
Tom\'s lawyer said that he couldn\'t put Tom on the stand.
